Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util

Interface HbckErrorReporter

All Known Implementing Classes:
HBaseFsck.PrintingErrorReporter
@Deprecated @Private public interface HbckErrorReporter
Deprecated.
Since 2.3.0. To be removed in hbase4. Use HBCK2 instead. Remove when HBaseFsck is removed.
Used by HBaseFsck reporting system.
